code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Notifications(){const[notifications,setNotifications]=useState([{message:'🔔 Market volatility is high today',type:'warning'},{message:'✅ Your NFT was minted successfully',type:'success'},{message:'⚙️ Scheduled maintenance at 2:00 AM UTC',type:'info'}]);const clearNotifications=()=>setNotifications([]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'2em'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCE2 Notifications"}),notifications.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No new notifications"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{style:{paddingLeft:'1em'},children:notifications.map((note,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{style:{marginBottom:'0.5em'},children:note.message},idx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:clearNotifications,style:{marginTop:'1em',padding:'8px 16px',backgroundColor:'#dc3545',color:'white',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Clear Notifications"})]});}export default Notifications;
